g.title: Cottage
g.text: You are standing in a small cottage.
You see: a fishing polean old lamp

g.title: Garden Path
g.text: You are standing on a lush garden path. There is a cottage here.

g.title: Fishing Pond
g.text: You are at the edge of a small fishing pond.
You see: a small fishing pond

g.title: Winding Path
g.text: You are walking along a winding path that leads south and east. There is a tall tree here.

g.title: Drawbridge
g.text: You come to the drawbridge of Action Castle. There is a mean troll guarding the bridge.

g.title: Top of the Tall Tree
g.text: You are at the top of a tall tree. There is a stout deadbranch here. From your perch you can see the tower of Action Castle.
You see: a dead brancha stout, dead branch

g.title: Winding Path->Top of the Tall Tree
Courtyard
g.text: You are in the courtyard of Action Castle. A castle guardstands watch to the east. Stairs lead up into the tower and down into darkness.

g.title: Top of the Tall Tree->Winding Path
Great Feasting Hall
g.text: You stand inside the great feasting hall. There is a strange candle here. Exits are to the east and west.

g.title: Courtyard->Great Feasting Hall
g.text: The guard refuses to let you pass.

g.title: Tower Stairs
g.text: You climb the tower stairs until you come to a door.

g.title: Dungeon Stairs
g.text: You are on the dungeon stairs. It’s very dark here.

g.title: Throne Room
g.text: This is the throne room of Action Castle. There is an ornate gold throne here.

g.title: Tower
g.text: You are in the tower. There is a princess here. Stairs lead down.
You see: a beautiful, sad and lonely princess

g.title: Dungeon
g.text: You are in the dungeon. There is a spooky ghost here. Stairs lead up.
